title: Marko Janjetović
text:
Marko Janjetović (born 22 April 1984) is a <a href="Croatia">Croatia</a>n former <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="midfielder%20%28association%20football%29">midfielder</a>. He played central and defensive midfielder position.
Career.
Janjetović began playing football for <a href="H%C5%A0K%20Zrinjski%20Mostar">HŠK Zrinjski Mostar</a>. He spent the next several seasons in the <a href="Prva%20HNL">Croatian first division</a> playing with <a href="NK%20Hrvatski%20dragovoljac">NK Hrvatski dragovoljac</a>, <a href="NK%20Inter%20Zapre%C5%A1i%C4%87">NK Inter Zaprešić</a> and <a href="NK%20Me%C4%91imurje">NK Međimurje</a>. In August 2008, he joined <a href="Russian%20First%20League">Russian First League</a> side <a href="FC%20SKA%20Rostov-on-Don">FC SKA Rostov-on-Don</a>, and would return to the Croatian league after one season in Rostov.
Janjetović has played for Croatia at various youth levels, but has not yet appeared for the senior team.
